comment_body:
Hey /u/Xx_Kronik_xX, thanks for contributing to /r/shortscarystories. Unfortunately, your post was removed as it violates our rules:

Do not plagiarize stories; while you may use a famous urban legend, etc. for inspiration if you rework it heavily, you cannot merely slightly edit it and keep your story up.

Please read the sidebar before posting again. If you have questions or concerns, please [message the moderators through modmail](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/shortscarystories&subject=&message=). Thank you!
I like this story, I really do, but I've read it before. You know, the clown statue in the hallway _and_ the angel statue outside the window?
As soon as I saw the title I knew what this story would be. I think the first time I read this one was probably late 00s in a chain email, except it was a clown statue
For more horror check out, r/KronikNightmares
Hold on, please share this one because I don't know it
